title: Add doctor command
description:
Dungeon depends on Node.js for its MCP server (mcp/server.mjs) and npm packages (@modelcontextprotocol/sdk, zod). If node_modules is missing or Node.js isn't installed, the plugin fails silently.

Add a /dungeon doctor command (or check on startup) that reports:
- Node.js found and version adequate
- mcp/node_modules/ exists and has required packages
- Plugin registered in Claude Code
- Game state file accessible (.claude/dungeon.local.md)

Pattern: Biff (biff doctor), Quarry (quarry doctor), LangLearn TTS (langlearn-tts doctor).

title: Build Node.js stdio MCP server for dungeon plugin
description: Create a lightweight Node.js stdio MCP server that exposes tools for game state I/O: dungeon_save (write state to .claude/dungeon.local.md), dungeon_load (read state), dungeon_read_script (read from scripts/). This replaces direct Read/Write tool calls in the game engine, eliminating intrusive tool chrome during gameplay. Register via .mcp.json in plugin root. Target: ~50-80 lines, zero npm dependencies (use built-in node:fs, node:readline).
close_reason: MCP server implemented (mcp/server.mjs) with 6 tools. SKILL.md updated to use MCP tools. DESIGN.md has DES-008.
